fields.headline: ROBIN COOK JOINS THE GUARDIAN
fields.bodyText: The Guardian has signed up the outspoken former foreign secretary Robin Cook to write a weekly column exclusively for the paper's comment pages. Seumas Milne, Comment Editor at the Guardian, said: "Robin Cook has been an outstandingly effective critic of Tony Blair's war in Iraq since his resignation last year. He is in a pivotal position to illuminate what is really at stake as Labour prepares to fight for a third term. His columns will certainly be a must read." -ends- For more information contact: Anna Sinfield, Press Office, on 020 7239 9818.
